requires_license.evidence: A person applying for the issuance or renewal of a licence to operate a short-term rental must, in addition to meeting the requirements of the Business Licence Bylaw:

principal_residence_only.answer_span: provide evidence, satisfactory to the Licence Inspector
principal_residence_only.evidence: provide evidence, satisfactory to the Licence Inspector, that the premises where the short-term rental will be operated are the operator’s principal residence.

display_license_on_listing.evidence: A person may offer to rent premises for rent as a short-term rental only if a valid business licence number is included in any advertising, listing, or promotion material that is intended to communicate availability of the premises for short-term rental.

max_entire_home_nights.evidence: While you are away, you can rent your entire unit for no more than 160 nights in a calendar year.
